title: Time to dust off those moves and get rowdy in the woods.

events.name: Best Trick
events.description: Find yourself throwing the best whip over the last jump on Tailwind. Judged more on style than difficulty.

events.name: Best Tailwind
events.description: Find your rhythm and show your flow through the Tailwind, style out with your own flavor.

events.name: Roundabout
events.description: Head-to-Head racing. Starting at either Blue or Green, go down them both, with a frantic climb up the return trail! The runs will be marked and there is a shared climb, so watch your elbows.

events.name: Choice Is Yours
events.description: Head-to-Head racing, with a twist. Choose a lane and face your doom.
